en.content: You sidestep and slip out of the workshop. As the artisan follows, you swing the door into his face. He staggers back, a hand to his nose. You take the opportunity to flee. You can investigate further if you would like. But perhaps it would be wiser to leave town.

text.content: You may check-mark the small box beside the Dodge skill.

zh.content: 你一个滑步溜出工坊。工匠紧随其后，你将门板甩到他的脸上。他踉跄后退，用手捂住鼻子，你趁机逃跑了。只要你愿意，你还可以继续调查；但离开村庄可能更加明智。

text.content: 你可以在「闪避」技能左边的小方框里打勾。
